attributes.action: Halt building on floodplain and greenbelt land with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask Gordon Brown to not consider building housing on greenbelt lands or floodplain land. Like under-developed countries where forests have been cut down flood plains are necessary for our country.  Instead of building new housing we ask the Prime Minister to make use of the countless empty brand new office buildings throughout and on the outskirts of towns and cities.
